title: THE BRIEF
list: Bonnier AB comprises over 175 companies operating in 16 countries. Their total headcount surpasses 9,000, with different HR systems for each branch.
Bonnier need to streamline an incredible amount of employee data across the world for effective management.

title: THE SOLUTION
content:
We developed a custom, centralized system named BonCom to unify Bonnier’s vast employee information.
                       
                       Boncom allowed for smooth operations for managers to quickly access and analyze employee information based on any category.

title: TECHNICAL DETAILS
list: A website to access, analyze, and manage employee information across the Bonnier Group.
MIM integration solutions pulled HR data across all systems of Bonnier’s subsidiaries, and re-organized it in real time.
We developed & maintained over 30 MIM connectors, which integrated MIM with the different HR systems in subsidiaries.
MIM portal workflows automatically syncs individual data.
